name: Career Compass
desc: Career Compass is a Job search MERN stack application to find the right job for developers and a platform to post jobs for recruiters.

name: Speak Easy
desc: SpeakEasy is a Real time chat web application built using MERN stack and Socket.IO

name: B - Tree using OOP concepts
desc: Implemented a B-Tree Data Structure using Object Oriented Programming concepts and C++ Programming Language.

name: Dictionary ADT
desc: Implemented the Dictionary Data Structure in C Language. Structures, void pointers and Linked list Data structure is used to store the key, values pairs.

name: Text Editor
desc: Implemented a Text editor using C Programming Language, Stack Data Structure and File management. Stack is used to implement undo and redo operations.

name: Day Finder
desc: Implemented a Day finder Software using C Language. It takes date, month and year as inputs and output the Day. It works on the concept of odd days calculation.
